About Anne Klein Watches

The Anne Klein woman is multifaceted, sophisticated, and above all real. Driven by confidence, honesty, and adventure, her devotion to design and quality is reflected in her everyday essentials. From Anne Klein, this woman expects a consistent fit, good quality, and something she can move and feel comfortable in. She wants to feel timeless yet modern, sensual yet bold, and unconstrained by seasonality.

White easy-to-read dial with full Arabic numerals
Silver-tone 25mm brass case with mineral glass crystal
Indiglo light-up watch dial
Water resistant to 30m (100ft): in general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing
Developed by Timex in the early 90s, our INDIGLO night-light allows wearers to tell time in the dark with the push of a button.


Timeless Design

For 40 years and counting, the Timex Easy Reader has been a fan favorite. The iconic simplicity of the collection is exactly what a watch should be: a well-crafted and sensible timepiece.

Read more

Timex Easy Reader




Easy-to-Read Dial

True to its name, easy-to-read numbers are balanced with the clean dial design.

Attention to Detail & Quality

When it comes to a well-made watch, every detail matters. The all-metal case and mineral glass lens offer strength and durability.

Indiglo

Our revolutionary Indiglo backlight technology changed how the world told time in the dark.

Read more


Quick-Release Straps

Refresh your favorite watch with our interchangeable quick-release straps. Box set comes with a leather strap and stainless steel expansion band.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:06:40 UTC – Details)


The newest from Motor Trend: 3 layer waterproof car seat covers feature a soft polyester cloth outer layer with waterproof neoprene backing. Behind these layers is a patented non-slip backing which both reinforces and prevents tearing, while also keeping the cover in place and preventing slippage.
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Read more

Motor Trend AquaShield Car Seat Covers

Waterproof Neoprene Material with Modern Sideless Design

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. They offer full seat protection against spills and stains that occur inside of your vehicle.

Specially selected for maximum comfort during your daily commute, we use a lightweight Poly blend outer material that offers a high level of ventilation.

Universal Fit

Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Waterproof neoprene foam repels all liquids.
  • Stylish two-tone design in multiple colors.
  • Compatible with side airbags and arm rests.
  • Easy to install within minutes.

Read more

Refresh the Look of Your Interior

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Easily refresh the look of your interior in minutes.

Sideless Designs for Built-In Armrests

Our universal seat covers are fully compatible with side airbags and armrests. Universal fit for most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUV. Please check dimensions before installation.

Waterproof Neoprene Lining

Have peace of mind knowing that your front seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. Waterproof neoprene foam lines the inside of our covers to provide maximum protection.

Read more

Made for Auto Enthusiasts

Motor Trend offers only high-quality premium products designed to protect and enhance your car or truck.

Read more

Comfortable ‘Rome’ cloth (polyester mesh) with padded foam backing. New look renew your vehicle instantly. Easy installation (instructions and clip/hooks included). Compatible with side air bags and armrests optional. Reinforced foam padding provides added comfort. Check to ensure: Your vehicle has detachable headrests, your front seats are not attached to the mid console, your front seats do not have integrated (attached to the seat itself) seat belts. Colors/finish: Charcoal Materials: Poly pro Set includes: Two(2) front seat and one(1) rear seat Setting: Indoor Dimensions: Front top 22 inches wide x 22 inches long Dimensions: Front bottom 23 inches wide x 18 inches long Dimensions: Rear top 56 inches wide x 30 inches long Dimensions: Rear bottom 56 inches wide x 23. 5 Inches long Care instructions: Normal wash and dry with water Venice series seat covers all new sleek design Double stitched seams you get the toughest, most durable and longest lasting covers available100-Percent washable breathable cloth prevents odors and dirt build up Easy slip-on and hoop installation instructions included adjustable and customizable fit Make: Universal Assembly: Assembled.
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our car seat covers provide protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle.
BREATHABLE MATERIAL – Specially selected for maximum comfort during your daily commute. We use a specially selected lightweight Poly-blend material that offers a high level of ventilation.
9-PIECE FULL SET SEAT COVERS – Protect and refresh all seats inside of your vehicle. Our car seat covers full set includes 2 x Front Seat Covers, 1 x Split Rear Bench Cover (Top and Bottom) and 5 x Headrest Covers.
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the rear bench seat cover and headrest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Read more

BDK UltraSleek Car Seat Covers, Full Set

Easy to Install with Two-Tone Accent

Protect and refresh all seats inside of your vehicle. Our car seat covers full set includes 2 x Front Seat Covers, 1 x Split Rear Bench Cover (Top & Bottom) and 5 x Headrest Covers.

We use specially selected materials for maximum comfort during your daily commute. The honeycomb mesh back and seat provide enhanced ventilation so that you stay cool and comfortable during your drive.

Easy to Install

The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the rear bench seat cover and headrest covers.

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Refresh and customize the look of your interior.
  • Stylish two-tone design in multiple colors.
  • Easy to install within minutes.
  • Universal fit for most vehicles.

Read more

Features and Benefits

Refresh Your Interior

Refresh the look of your vehicle and turn some heads along the way. This full set of seat covers features a stylish two-tone design with stitched accents, making it easy to add a splash of color to your interior.

Soft and Comfortable

We use specially selected materials for maximum comfort during your daily commute. The high-quality poly outer layer provides enhanced ventilation so that you stay cool and comfortable during your drive.

Universal Fit

The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the rear bench seat cover and headrest covers.

Read more

Compatible with Split Benches

These car seat covers are ready for 60/40, 50/50 and 40/60 fold downs, making it simple for the user.

Airbag Compatible

Quick and easy to use, simply zip to fold down and expose your center console.

Installs in Minutes

Watch the installation video we uploaded here on Amazon to see just how quick and easy it is to install an entire set of car seat covers!

Read more

Rear Bench Install Guide

Installation Process:

1. Remove Headrests

2. Align the Top Back Seat Covers

3. Slide and Tuck the Loops at the Bottom of the Seats

4. (Pull Seats Down) Connect the Top Loops with the Bottom Loops with Hooks Behind the Seat

5. Cut Slits for Belt Guides

6. Cut Slits for Headrests

7. Align Bottom Seat Covers

8. Cut Slits for Belt Buckles

9. Tuck Bottom Covers and Slide Belt Buckles
